title: Shaco clone never die, it is  not a glitch
body:
So according to RIOT data after certain period of time{{champion:35}} clone will disappear as it will take 9,999 damage but i build  Stoneplate on shaco with 5K hp on this champ, Goes into enemy team activate it use my R(ultimate) and get my clone out if my clone manage to survive

it will take 9,999 damage but it wont die due to RIOT data as it says it will take max 9,999 damage. it will stay with me until i use my other clone. So my question is it is not a Glitch according to your rule books and game so i don't think there is any issue with this, hope this is clear until you guys provide some specific information.

replies.body:
Hey there,

I'm unsure if this is intentional or not, however you may wish to make a thread over on the [report a bug](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) board about this for clarities sake.

Be sure to read the "[How to Report a Game Bug](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/3mQGBEjA-how-to-report-a-game-bug)" thread before posting.
Tested and can confirm it functions like this. However if you ult again it destroys the last clone. I think this should probably be in the 'report a bug' section.
it is not a bug as it says clone will take 9,999 damage according to riot, so i guess if clone have more hp than 9,999 then he can survive. If they are not fixing it then i guess its not a bug 100%.
